main event: A sighting of a UFO with red and green lights was reported via ground-radar near Selma, California on August 29, 1952.
interesting points: The observation lasted for 4 minutes,Only one object was reported during the sighting,No shape, sound, or speed was documented for the object, The lights were noted to be moving up and down, Insufficient data was provided for further evaluation.
sighted object: one object with red and green lights
witness description: Observer was located at geo. ref. AD 2 935 near Selma, California, and reported the sighting visually from the ground.
